creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure in hooded garment, seated in 3/4 profile against a stone at L, head bent over a large book resting on his knees
inscription:
Inscription

in graphite below platemark at bottom center: Probedruck (\"sample print\")
provenance: Galerie Gerda Bassenge, Berlin, sold to Bergquist; [James A. Bergquist until October 1, 1990; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Seated Monk Reading
